<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/governance/script-audit-events"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns an audit trail of script lifecycle actions such as creation,
activation, rollback, binding, and deletion.
